Edvard Grieg

Entry of the Boyars, EG 183 (Johan Halvorsen)

1895

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement a march for orchestra, Bojarenes Indtogsmarsch, by Johan Halvorsen.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · IV/20 · Addenda et corrigenda · ed. Rune Andersen / Finn Benestad / Klaus Henning Oelmann [facsimile of first edition]

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3
